fr.epita.ima.dbconnection

Class IdentityDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.ima.dbconnection.IdentityDAO

  • public class IdentityDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the DAO. It helps create connection with the database. All the actions on the database are to be done via this object.
    Author:
    Neha
